title: Hollywood Take on Christchurch Massacre Provokes Anger in New Zealand
content:
1. Hollywood Take on Christchurch Massacre Provokes Anger in New Zealand  The New York Times
  2. Producer in Christchurch attacks movie quits amid backlash, Jacinda Ardern criticism  The Washington Post
  3. Christchurch attacks: producer resigns from film They Are Us as criticism grows  The Guardian
  4. Mosque attacks film: Movies about politicians should not be taxpayer-funded  Stuff.co.nz
  5. It is, quite simply, wrong to insist that the tragic events of 15 March 2019 belong to anything, or anyone, but History itself, Chris Trotter argues  Interest.co.nz
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
